monogr.title: Law, Christianity and Modernism in Islamic Society: Proceedings of the Eighteenth Congress of the Union Européenne des Arabisants et Islamisants Held at the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven (September 3 – September 9, 1996)

body.bibl: Smet, Daniel de, and Jan M. F. van Reeth. “Les Citations Bibliques Dans l’œuvre Du Dâ‘î Ismaélien Hamîd Ad-Dîn al-Kirmânî.” In Law, Christianity and Modernism in Islamic Society: Proceedings of the Eighteenth Congress of the Union Européenne Des Arabisants et Islamisants Held at the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven (September 3 – September 9, 1996), edited by U. Vermeulen and Jan M. F. van Reeth, 147–60. Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta 86. Leuven: Peeters, 1998.
